mean_en: a person who uses or supports strong actions (such as public protests) to help make changes in politics or society
sentence: These environmental activists are calling for action to be taken to fight climate change!
sentence_trans: 这些环保积极分子正呼吁采取行动应对气候变化！
word_etyma: activ(e)积极的，活跃的 + ist表示某种主义或某种信仰者 → activist 积极分子，激进主义分子
